bioconda.name: bioconductor-camera
bioconda.summary: Collection of annotation related methods for mass spectrometry data

biotools.summary: Annotation of peaklists generated by xcms, rule based annotation of isotopes and adducts, isotope validation, EIC correlation based tagging of unknown adducts and fragments.

bioschemas.name: CAMERA
bioschemas.summary: Annotation of peaklists generated by xcms, rule based annotation of isotopes and adducts, isotope validation, EIC correlation based tagging of unknown adducts and fragments.
